Title: Editorial: JAS on the move
Abstract: © 2018On his retirement as Editor of Journal of Archaeological Science (JAS) at the end of 2017, we celebrate Thilo Rehren's contributions to the growth of the journal over the past 13 years and, consequently, his impacts in shaping archaeological science as a discipline. Since Rehren was an architect of the new consortium of journals comprising JAS and JAS Reports, on this occasion it is also appropriate to consider the future of publishing in the constantly evolving field of archaeological science.
